item.title: A Very Darwin Christmas: Reminder to Evolutionary Biologists to Never Stop Exploring!
item.description: To all of my colleagues, friends, and peeps in Evolutionary Biology, here is a belated Merry Christmas pic of #Darwin. Given his devotion to understanding nature, Charles Darwin gave up two years of his life to work as a naturalist aboard the HMS Beagle; the trip took ~5 yrs instead; and he logged this entry in his journal/book on his voyage while hoping to return to England soon (it would take several more months to actually make it back):
